typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as short,
		store_and_fwd_flag as boolean,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_time_in_secs as short,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as short,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_time_in_secs as short,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source2 window(asc(pickup_datetime, true),
	previous_pickup_datetime = lag(pickup_datetime,1)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(diffInMins = toInteger(pickup_datetime - previous_pickup_datetime)/60000) ~> DerivedColumn1
